001/**  This controller provides functionality for the purchase page and commits all order and customer information to the database
002 * @author Shruti Oruganti
003 */
004package src.controller;
005
006import src.database.dbConnect;
007
008import static src.controller.useful_functions.switch_scene;
009
010import java.sql.*;
011
012import javafx.fxml.FXML;
013import javafx.scene.control.Button;
014import javafx.scene.control.Label;
015import javafx.event.ActionEvent;
016
017import java.text.NumberFormat;
018import java.util.Locale;
019
020import src.model.customer;
021import src.model.order;
022import src.model.orderItem;
023
024
025public class transaction_page_controller {
026
027    @FXML private Label total_price;        // label that shows the running total
028    @FXML private Button purchase_button;   // the big “Purchase” button
029
030    private boolean purchaseDone = false;
031    private final NumberFormat currency = NumberFormat.getCurrencyInstance(Locale.US);
032
033    private customer customer;
034    private order order;
035    
036    /**
037     * Receiveing and storing order and cutsomer information from customer page controller and updating total label with the order's subtotal
038     * @param customer - the name of the customer
039     * @param order - the order of the customer
040     */
041    public void setData(customer customer, order order) {
042        this.customer = customer;
043        this.order = order;
044        updateTotalLabel();
045    }
046
047    /**
048     * Initialising the FXML page elements
049     */
050    @FXML
051    public void initialize() {
052        purchaseDone = false;
053        if (purchase_button != null) purchase_button.setText("Purchase");
054        updateTotalLabel();
055    }
056
057    /**
058     * This function commits all order and customer details to database
059     */
060    private void commitToDatabase() {
061
062        try (Connection conn = dbConnect.getConnection()) {
063            conn.setAutoCommit(false);
064
065            //Insert Customer
066            int customerId = -1;
067            PreparedStatement checkStmt = conn.prepareStatement("SELECT customerid FROM customer WHERE cus_fname = ? AND cus_lname = ?");
068            checkStmt.setString(1, customer.getFirstName());
069            checkStmt.setString(2, customer.getLastName());
070
071            ResultSet rs = checkStmt.executeQuery();
072            if (rs.next()) {
073                customerId = rs.getInt("customerid");
074                customer.setCustomerId(customerId);
075                System.out.println("Existing customer found: " + customerId);
076            }
077
078            if (customerId == -1) {
079                PreparedStatement insertStmt = conn.prepareStatement("INSERT INTO customer (cus_fname, cus_lname) VALUES (?, ?) RETURNING customerid");
080                insertStmt.setString(1, customer.getFirstName());
081                insertStmt.setString(2, customer.getLastName());
082
083                ResultSet rs1 = insertStmt.executeQuery();
084                if (rs1.next()) {
085                    customerId = rs1.getInt("customerid");
086                    customer.setCustomerId(customerId);
087                    System.out.println("New customer inserted: " + customerId);
088                }
089            }
090
091            //Insert Order
092            int orderId;
093            double subtotal = order.getSubtotal();
094            double tax = subtotal * 0.0825;
095            double total = subtotal + tax;
096
097            PreparedStatement stmt = conn.prepareStatement("INSERT INTO orders (customerid, orderdate, ordertime, ordersubtotal, ordertax, ordertotal) VALUES (?, CURRENT_DATE, NOW(), ?, ?, ?) RETURNING orderid");
098            stmt.setInt(1, customer.getCustomerId());
099            stmt.setDouble(2, subtotal);
100            stmt.setDouble(3, tax);
101            stmt.setDouble(4, total);
102
103            ResultSet rs2 = stmt.executeQuery();
104            if (rs2.next()) {
105                orderId = rs2.getInt("orderid");
106                order.setId(orderId);
107            } else {
108                throw new SQLException("Failed to insert order");
109            }
110
111            //Insert Order Items
112            for (orderItem item : order.getItems()) {
113                PreparedStatement stmt1 = conn.prepareStatement("INSERT INTO orderitems (orderid, customerid, productid, sugarlevel, icelevel) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?) RETURNING orderitemid");
114                stmt1.setInt(1, order.getId());
115                stmt1.setInt(2, customer.getCustomerId());
116                stmt1.setInt(3, item.getProduct().getId());
117                stmt1.setInt(4, item.getSugarLevel());
118                stmt1.setInt(5, item.getIceLevel());
119
120                ResultSet rs3 = stmt1.executeQuery();
121                if (rs3.next() == false) {
122                    throw new SQLException("Failed to insert order");
123                }
124
125                //Updated inventory item quanitities
126                PreparedStatement stmt2 = conn.prepareStatement("SELECT ingredientid, quantity FROM drinkingredients WHERE productid = ?");
127                stmt2.setInt(1, item.getProduct().getId());
128                ResultSet rsIngredients = stmt2.executeQuery();
129
130                while (rsIngredients.next()) {
131                    int ingredientId = rsIngredients.getInt("ingredientid");
132                    double quantity = rsIngredients.getDouble("quantity");
133
134                    PreparedStatement updateStmt = conn.prepareStatement("UPDATE ingredients SET currentquantity = currentquantity - ? WHERE ingredientid = ?");
135                    updateStmt.setDouble(1, quantity);
136                    updateStmt.setInt(2, ingredientId);
137                    updateStmt.executeUpdate();
138                }
139            }
140
141            conn.commit();
142            System.out.println("Order committed successfully!");
143
144        } catch (SQLException e) {
145            e.printStackTrace();
146        }        if (purchase_button != null) purchase_button.setText("Purchase");
147        //Database connection automatically closes due to try-catch block
148        updateTotalLabel();
149    }
150
151    /**
152     * This function sets the label to reflect order subtotal when order is recieved from customer FXML page
153     */
154    private void updateTotalLabel() {
155        if (order == null) {
156            total_price.setText(currency.format(0));
157            return;
158        }
159        double total = order.getSubtotal() * 1.0825;
160        if (total_price != null) {
161            total_price.setText(currency.format(total));
162        }
163    }
164
165    /**
166     * This function calls the function to commit to database and display text to say purchase was successful when purchase button is clicked
167     * @param event - Trigger that calls the function
168     */
169    @FXML
170    private void handle_purchase(ActionEvent event) {
171        commitToDatabase();
172
173        // Update UI
174        updateTotalLabel();
175        purchase_button.setText("Purchase successful!");
176        purchaseDone = true;
177    }
178
179    /**
180     * This function handles the back click action
181     * @param event - Trigger for the function to be called
182     */
183    @FXML
184    private void handle_back_click(ActionEvent event) {
185        // Before purchase -> go back to enter_name
186        // After purchase  -> go to order_page
187        if (purchaseDone) {
188            switch_scene("GUI/order_page.fxml", event);
189        } else {
190            switch_scene("GUI/enter_name.fxml", event);
191        }
192    }
193
194    
195}
